title: Gelatin Crystal
summaries: The Gelatin Crystal is a Hardmode boss-summoning item used to summon the Queen Slime. When a Crystal Shard is to be generated, it has a 1/50 (2%) chance to be replaced by a Gelatin Crystal instead. It drops the item used to summon the Queen Slime upon breaking it and can be used at any time of day and any depth, as long as the player is in the Hallow.

statistics.Sell: 1 GC
